repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Warwick Mills Photographs of Hurricane Damage
did.abstract: Images depict the Warwick Mills building in Centreville, R.I., after the Great Hurricane of 1938.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes photographs of the Warwick Mills building in Centreville, R.I., after the Great Hurricane of 1938. Two exterior views and one interior view of the damage to fourth-story on left-hand end of building. Corner of fourth floor has been opened up to the elements.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Warwick Mills Photographs of Hurricane Damage #6937 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: American Textile History Museum Collection, gift of Gordon Osborne

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The ATHM # references the accession number given to collections by the American Textile History Museum. These numbers have been kept and tracked for reseachers looking for former citations. For images, these numbers will also be the digital object identifer if the item was scanned.

did.unittitle: Hurricane damage to exterior of Warwick Mills, ATHM# 0000.1495.1

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print. Image depicts the Warwick Mills building in Centreville, RI, after the Great Hurricane of 1938. Four-story brick building; damage to fourth-story on left-hand end of building. Corner of fourth floor has been opened up to the elements.

did.unittitle: Hurricane damage to interior of Warwick Mills, ATHM# 0000.1495.2

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print. Image depicts the Warwick Mills building in Centreville, RI., after the Great Hurricane of 1938. Damage from hurricane evident from inside the top (fourth) story of the building; part of the roof appears to have caved in; bricks are piled by the wall that is open to the outside.

did.unittitle: Hurricane damage to Warwick Mills and surrounding area, ATHM# 0000.1495.3

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print. Image depicts the Warwick Mills building in Centreville, RI, after the Great Hurricane of 1938. Fourth floor has been opened up to the elements; uprooted trees in foreground almost obscure the building.
